data.message: took me so long to wait for that moment i clouldnt take it did not feel normal it all felt so fake but as i start to wake i look down and i see its not, broken leg i forgot couldnt even see the show i was blocked all because of a broken leg now im stuck in bed while my brother is telling me everything that was said and so i phoned couldnt hear very clearly but i got the message heard the music too crowed is going mad and its all because of you and one day wen i see you ima shake your hand not as a fan but for what you have brought and for what you stand a true rap god i wish you would come again but you wont because you said its the end yes i hear the songs words and i fully understand a message others cant see blinded by society i see you trying to get free i could stand right there but it wouldnt even be you and me i thank you shady for staying a true homi .... true story like if you feel me>>> brandon A.K.A casper
